name: Thirdweb
author: thirdweb-dev
description:
Read/write to over 2k blockchains, enabling data querying, contract analysis/deployment, and transaction execution, powered by Thirdweb. 

Thirdweb is an all-in-one dev stack for web3 apps and infra. The MCP gives you access to all Thirdweb features directly from Cursor.
